Notes: Prohibits healthcare providers from administering gender-afirming healthcare to minors
Makes performances including "male and female impersonates" on public property or where a minor could view them a Class A midemenor/Class E felony
Requirement for businesses that host adult caberet performances to obtain a license

Description: Defines legal definition of sex as "immutable"
Notes: Defines sex as a person's "immutable biological sex" in the Tennessee Code
Allows private schools to require students to compete in sports according to their biological sex
Bans DEI curriculum for students studying healthcare at public universities

Description: Bans instruction about sexual orientation in K-12 schools
Notes: Bans instruction about sexual orientation in K-12 schools

Description: Allows same-sex wedding to be denied
Notes: Allows solomnizer to refuse service to a same-sex wedding on religious basis

Description: Prohibits government medical assistance for gender-affirming surgeries
Notes: Prohibits TennCare contractors from providing medical assistance for gender-affirming surgeries for patients of all ages

Topic: Allows school employees to misgender students
Description: Shields public school employees from civil liability if they misgender students
Notes: Shields public school employees from civil liability if they misgender students

Description: States that parents should control the education, healthcare, and mental health of their children
Notes: States that parents should control the education, healthcare, and mental health of their children

Topic: Youth gender-affirming healthcare and counseling ban
Description: Expands youth gender-affirming healthcare ban to include counseling, parental rights
Notes: Expands youth gender-affirming healthcare ban to include counseling, parental rights

Description: States that hormone treatment is "not a standard medical practice" for minors
Notes: States that hormone treatment is "not a standard medical practice" for minors

Description: Requires written consent from parents for students to learn about "family life curriculum" and recieve school health services
